sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO w_consulting_action_master ( manager , consulting_action_no , action_consulting_type
, registration_date
, registration_strtime
, registration_endtime
, action_received_type , contact_tel_no , contact_email , client_name , client_gender , client_belong , client_victim_rel_type , client_victim_rel_type_etc , org_accident_step , org_accident_step_etc
, action_type_monitoring , action_type_info , action_type_req_listening , action_type_other_org_info , action_type_other_org_min , action_type_other_org_civil_criminal , action_type_other_org_rights , action_type_other_org_etc , action_type_other_org_etc_txt , action_type_servie_rel , action_type_servie_rel_consulting , action_type_servie_rel_law_min , action_type_servie_rel_medic , action_type_servie_rel_etc , action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt , action_type_etc, action_type_etc_txt
, action_contents , action_type_cont
, action_type_cont_etc_txt
, after_plan , action_etc , consulting_history_no , action_consulting_date_from , action_consulting_date_to , counselNum , action_contents_etc , delete_reason , create_user , create_date , delete_yn ) VALUES ( #manager#
, #consulting_action_no#
, #consulting_action_no#
, #action_consulting_type#
, #registration_date#
, #registration_strtime#
, #registration_endtime#
, #action_received_type# , #contact_tel_no# , #contact_email# , #client_name# , #client_gender# , #client_belong# , #client_victim_rel_type# , #client_victim_rel_type_etc# , #org_accident_step# , #org_accident_step_etc#
, #action_type_monitoring# , #action_type_info# , #action_type_req_listening# , #action_type_other_org_info# , #action_type_other_org_min# , #action_type_other_org_civil_criminal# , #action_type_other_org_rights# , #action_type_other_org_etc# , #action_type_other_org_etc_txt# , #action_type_servie_rel# , #action_type_servie_rel_consulting# , #action_type_servie_rel_law_min# , #action_type_servie_rel_medic# , #action_type_servie_rel_etc# , #action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt# , #action_type_etc# , #action_type_etc_txt#
, #action_contents# , #action_type_cont#
, #action_type_cont_etc_txt#
, #after_plan# , #action_etc# , #consulting_history_no# , CASE WHEN #action_consulting_date_from# = '' THEN NULL ELSE #action_consulting_date_from# END , CASE WHEN #action_consulting_date_to# = '' THEN NULL ELSE #action_consulting_date_to# END , #counselNum# , #action_contents_etc# , #delete_reason# , #create_user# , now() , 'N' )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

sql.isNotEmpty: AND a.consulting_action_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr WHERE manager IN ( SELECT USERID FROM ZUSER WHERE USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#manager_name#,'%') ) AND con_ac_type = 'ac' )

AND consulting_action_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_commissioner WHERE counselNum IN ( select wc.counselNum from w_counselor wc where wc.counselName like concat('%',#counselName#,'%') ) )

sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) AS total FROM W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER a
JOIN W_CONSULTING_APPLICATION_MASTER D ON a.consulting_action_no = D.consulting_application_no
WHERE a.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND a.consulting_action_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr WHERE manager = #loginUserId# AND con_ac_type = 'ac' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum_ FROM ( SELECT a.actionNO , a.consulting_action_no , a.manager , ( CASE WHEN ccnt > 1 THEN concat(b.username,'외 ',ccnt-1,'인 ') ELSE b.username END ) AS manager_name , a.action_consulting_type , a.registration_date , a.action_received_type , a.contact_tel_no , a.contact_email , a.client_name , a.client_gender , a.client_belong , a.client_victim_rel_type , a.client_victim_rel_type_etc , a.org_accident_step , a.org_accident_step_etc
, a.action_type_monitoring , a.action_type_info , a.action_type_req_listening , a.action_type_other_org_info , a.action_type_other_org_min , a.action_type_other_org_civil_criminal , a.action_type_other_org_rights , a.action_type_other_org_etc , a.action_type_other_org_etc_txt , a.action_type_servie_rel , a.action_type_servie_rel_consulting , a.action_type_servie_rel_law_min , a.action_type_servie_rel_medic , a.action_type_servie_rel_etc , a.action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt , a.action_type_etc , a.action_type_etc_txt
, a.action_contents , a.action_type_cont
, a.action_type_cont_etc_txt
, a.after_plan , a.action_etc , a.consulting_history_no , a.action_consulting_date_from , a.action_consulting_date_to , a.counselNum , a.action_contents_etc , a.delete_reason , a.create_user , DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date , a.update_user , a.update_date , a.delete_user , a.delete_date , a.delete_yn
, rel_manager , CASE WHEN D.step_status = '1' THEN '신청' WHEN D.step_status = '2' THEN '접수대기' WHEN D.step_status = '3' THEN '접수승인' WHEN D.step_status = '4' THEN '접수불가' WHEN D.step_status = '5' THEN '심사대기' WHEN D.step_status = '6' THEN '심사거절' WHEN D.step_status = '7' THEN '심사승인' WHEN D.step_status = '8' THEN '진단 완료' ELSE '' END AS step_status_txt , CASE WHEN a.action_consulting_type = 'init' THEN '초기상담' WHEN a.action_consulting_type = 'continuing' THEN '지속상담' WHEN a.action_consulting_type = 'ending' THEN '종결상담' WHEN a.action_consulting_type = 'monitoring1' THEN '모니터링(1차)' WHEN a.action_consulting_type = 'monitoring2' THEN '모니터링(2차)' ELSE '' END AS action_consulting_type_txt , CASE WHEN a.action_received_type = 'tel' THEN '전화' WHEN a.action_received_type = 'email' THEN '메일' WHEN a.action_received_type = 'sms' THEN '문자' WHEN a.action_received_type = 'etc' THEN '기타' ELSE '' END AS action_received_type_txt , CASE WHEN a.client_gender = 'female' THEN '여성' WHEN a.client_gender = 'male' THEN '남성' WHEN a.client_gender = 'unknown' THEN '미상' ELSE '' END AS client_gender_txt , CASE WHEN a.client_victim_rel_type = 'me' THEN '본인' WHEN a.client_victim_rel_type = 'agent' THEN '대리인/조력자' WHEN a.client_victim_rel_type = 'relmanager' THEN '관련 담당자' WHEN a.client_victim_rel_type = 'etc' THEN CONCAT('기타-',a.client_victim_rel_type_etc) ELSE '' END AS client_victim_rel_type_txt , CASE WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'before_declaration' THEN '신고전' WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'after_declaration' THEN '신고 접수/상담' WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'investigation' THEN '조사' WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'review' THEN '심의' WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'punishment' THEN '징계' WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'followup' THEN '후속조치' WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'etc' THEN CONCAT('기타-',a.org_accident_step_etc) WHEN a.org_accident_step = 'unknown' THEN '미파악' ELSE '' END AS org_accident_step_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN a.action_type_monitoring = 'Y' THEN '진행상황 모니터링,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_info = 'Y' THEN '절차 안내 및 정보 제공,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_req_listening = 'Y' THEN '추가정보 및 요구사항 청취,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_other_org_info = 'Y' THEN '타 신고기관 안내-' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_other_org_min = 'Y' THEN '고용노동부,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_other_org_civil_criminal = 'Y' THEN '민/형사,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_other_org_rights = 'Y' THEN '국가인권위원회,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_other_org_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('그외-',a.action_type_other_org_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_servie_rel = 'Y' THEN '서비스 연계/지원-' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_servie_rel_consulting = 'Y' THEN '상담,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_servie_rel_law_min = 'Y' THEN '법률/노무,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_servie_rel_medic = 'Y' THEN '의료,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_servie_rel_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('그외-',a.action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN a.action_type_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('기타-',a.action_type_etc_txt,',') ELSE '' END) AS action_type_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN a.action_type_cont = 'coun' THEN '초기상담' WHEN a.action_type_cont = 'act' THEN '기관조치' WHEN a.action_type_cont = 'con' THEN '수사/조사의뢰' WHEN a.action_type_cont = 'move' THEN '이관' WHEN a.action_type_cont = 'cancel' THEN '각하' WHEN a.action_type_cont = 'giveup' THEN '취하' WHEN a.action_type_cont = 'etc' THEN CONCAT('기타-',a.action_type_cont_etc_txt) ELSE '' END, ' ', a.action_contents) AS action_type_cont_txt , e.counselName , CASE WHEN D.org_type = '1' THEN '공공' WHEN D.org_type = '2' THEN '민간' ELSE '' END AS org_type_txt , D.org_name , D.upper_org_name , D.org_member_count , CASE WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'national' THEN '국가기관' WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'local' THEN '지방자치단체(지자체)' WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'public' THEN '공공기관' WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'school' THEN '각급학교' ELSE '' END AS org_type_gov_detail_txt , D.belong_job_title , D.org_client_name , D.org_client_tel_no , D.org_client_email , CASE WHEN D.accident_response_hist = 'yes' THEN '유' WHEN D.accident_response_hist = 'no' THEN '무' WHEN D.accident_response_hist = 'none' THEN '발생했으나 공식처리되지 않음' ELSE '' END AS accident_response_hist_txt , D.accident_date , D.receipt_date , CONCAT(CASE WHEN D.harm_type_verbals = 'Y' THEN '언어적 성희롱,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.harm_type_body = 'Y' THEN '신체적 성희롱,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.harm_type_visual = 'Y' THEN '시각적 성희롱,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.harm_type_second = 'Y' THEN '2차 피해,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.harm_type_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('기타-',D.harm_etc_txt) ELSE '' END) AS harm_type_txt , CASE WHEN D.accident_step = 'step1' THEN '인지 및 접수 (삼당)' WHEN D.accident_step = 'step2' THEN '조사' WHEN D.accident_step = 'step3' THEN '고충심의위원회' WHEN D.accident_step = 'step4' THEN '종결 (후속조치)' ELSE '' END AS accident_step_txt , D.application_etc_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN D.first_org_type_all = 'Y' THEN '전수 설문조사 (조직문화 및 성희롱 성폭력 실태 파악),' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.first_org_type_inorg = 'Y' THEN '기관 내 성희롱ㆍ성폭력 사건처리 절차 및 제도* 자문* 성희롱 방지조치, 폭력예방교육, 성희롱ㆍ성폭력 예방지침 등,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.first_org_type_protect = 'Y' THEN '피해자 보호, 2차 피해 방지 방안 자문,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.first_org_type_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('기타-',D.first_org_type_etc_txt) ELSE '' END) AS first_org_type_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN D.dup_org_type_check = 'Y' THEN '기관 내 성희롱ㆍ성폭력 사건처리절차 검토 및 자문,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.dup_org_type_protect = 'Y' THEN '피해자 보호, 2차 피해 방지 및 재발방지대책 수립 자문,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.dup_org_type_all = 'Y' THEN '전수 설문조사 (조직문화 및 성희롱ㆍ성폭력 실태 파악),' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.dup_org_type_inorg = 'Y' THEN '기관 내 성희롱ㆍ성폭력 사건처리 제도*자문* 폭력예방교육, 성희롱ㆍ성폭력 예방지침 등,' ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.dup_org_type_etc = 'Y' THEN CONCAT('기타-',D.dup_org_type_etc_txt) ELSE '' END) AS dup_org_type_txt , CONCAT(CASE WHEN D.wish_consulting_date_1_yn = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_1,2,2),'년 ',SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_1,4,2),'분기,') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.wish_consulting_date_2_yn = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_2,2,2),'년 ',SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_2,4,2),'분기,') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.wish_consulting_date_3_yn = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_3,2,2),'년 ',SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_3,4,2),'분기,') ELSE '' END, CASE WHEN D.wish_consulting_date_4_yn = 'Y' THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_4,2,2),'년 ',SUBSTRING(D.wish_consulting_date_4,4,2),'분기,') ELSE '' END) AS wish_consulting_date_txt , D.reference_etc
FROM W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER a JOIN zuser b on a.manager = b.userid LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT consulting_action_no , (select USERNAME from zuser where userid = manager) as rel_manager , COUNT(*) AS ccnt FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr GROUP BY consulting_action_no ) C on A.consulting_action_no = C.consulting_action_no LEFT OUTER JOIN w_counselor e on a.counselNum = e.counselNum JOIN W_CONSULTING_APPLICATION_MASTER D ON a.consulting_action_no = D.consulting_application_no , (SELECT @rownum := #m#) R WHERE a.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND a.consulting_action_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr WHERE manager = #loginUserId# AND con_ac_type = 'ac' )
order by create_date desc LIMIT #m#, #n# ) row_ WHERE @rownum < (#n#+#m#) ) c

SELECT a.actionNO , a.consulting_action_no , a.manager , c.username as manager_name , a.action_consulting_type , a.registration_date , a.registration_strtime , a.registration_endtime , a.action_received_type , a.contact_tel_no , a.contact_email , a.client_name , a.client_gender , a.client_belong , a.client_victim_rel_type , a.client_victim_rel_type_etc , a.org_accident_step , a.org_accident_step_etc , a.action_type_monitoring , a.action_type_info , a.action_type_req_listening , a.action_type_other_org_info , a.action_type_other_org_min , a.action_type_other_org_civil_criminal , a.action_type_other_org_rights , a.action_type_other_org_etc , a.action_type_other_org_etc_txt , a.action_type_servie_rel , a.action_type_servie_rel_consulting , a.action_type_servie_rel_law_min , a.action_type_servie_rel_medic , a.action_type_servie_rel_etc , a.action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt , a.action_type_etc, action_type_etc_txt , a.action_contents , a.action_type_cont , a.action_type_cont_etc_txt , a.after_plan , a.action_etc , a.consulting_history_no , DATE_FORMAT(a.action_consulting_date_from,'%Y-%m-%d') AS action_consulting_date_from , DATE_FORMAT(a.action_consulting_date_to,'%Y-%m-%d') AS action_consulting_date_to , a.counselNum , b.counselName , a.action_contents_etc , a.delete_reason , a.create_user , a.create_date , a.update_user , a.update_date , a.delete_user , a.delete_date , a.delete_yn FROM W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER a JOIN zuser c on a.manager = c.userid LEFT OUTER JOIN W_COUNSELOR b ON a.counselNum = b.counselNum AND b.delYn = 'N' WHERE a.delete_yn = 'N'
AND a.consulting_action_no = #consulting_action_no#
AND a.actionNO = #actionNO#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER SET manager = #manager# , action_consulting_type = #action_consulting_type#
, registration_date = #registration_date#
, registration_strtime = #registration_strtime#
, registration_endtime = #registration_endtime#
, action_received_type = #action_received_type# , contact_tel_no = #contact_tel_no# , contact_email = #contact_email# , client_name = #client_name# , client_gender = #client_gender# , client_belong = #client_belong# , client_victim_rel_type = #client_victim_rel_type# , client_victim_rel_type_etc = #client_victim_rel_type_etc# , org_accident_step = #org_accident_step# , org_accident_step_etc = #org_accident_step_etc#
, action_type_monitoring = #action_type_monitoring# , action_type_info = #action_type_info# , action_type_req_listening = #action_type_req_listening# , action_type_other_org_info = #action_type_other_org_info# , action_type_other_org_min = #action_type_other_org_min# , action_type_other_org_civil_criminal = #action_type_other_org_civil_criminal# , action_type_other_org_rights = #action_type_other_org_rights# , action_type_other_org_etc = #action_type_other_org_etc# , action_type_other_org_etc_txt = #action_type_other_org_etc_txt# , action_type_servie_rel = #action_type_servie_rel# , action_type_servie_rel_consulting = #action_type_servie_rel_consulting# , action_type_servie_rel_law_min = #action_type_servie_rel_law_min# , action_type_servie_rel_medic = #action_type_servie_rel_medic# , action_type_servie_rel_etc = #action_type_servie_rel_etc# , action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt = #action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt# , action_type_etc = #action_type_etc# , action_type_etc_txt = #action_type_etc_txt#
, action_contents = #action_contents# , action_type_cont = #action_type_cont# , action_type_cont_etc_txt = #action_type_cont_etc_txt# , after_plan = #after_plan# , action_etc = #action_etc# , consulting_history_no = #consulting_history_no# , action_consulting_date_from = CASE WHEN #action_consulting_date_from# = '' THEN NULL ELSE #action_consulting_date_from# END , action_consulting_date_to = CASE WHEN #action_consulting_date_to# = '' THEN NULL ELSE #action_consulting_date_to# END , counselNum = #counselNum# , action_contents_etc = #action_contents_etc#
, update_user = #update_user# , update_date = NOW() WHERE consulting_action_no = #consulting_action_no#

UPDATE W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER SET DELETE_YN = 'Q' , DELETE_USER = #delete_user# , DELETE_DATE = NOW() WHERE actionNO IN
#delList[]#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER WHERE consulting_action_no IN
#delList[]#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER SET DELETE_YN = 'N' , update_user = #update_user# , update_date = NOW() WHERE consulting_action_no IN
#updList[]#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) AS total FROM W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'Q'
date_format($cond1$,'%Y%m%d') between #sdate# and #edate#
UPPER($cond2$) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#keyword#)||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum_ FROM ( SELECT `actionNO` , a.consulting_action_no , a.manager , ( CASE WHEN ccnt > 1 THEN concat(b.username,'외 ',ccnt-1,'인 ') ELSE b.username END ) AS manager_name , a.action_consulting_type , a.registration_date , a.action_received_type , a.contact_tel_no , a.contact_email , a.client_name , a.client_gender , a.client_belong , a.client_victim_rel_type , a.client_victim_rel_type_etc , a.org_accident_step , a.org_accident_step_etc
, a.action_type_monitoring , a.action_type_info , a.action_type_req_listening , a.action_type_other_org_info , a.action_type_other_org_min , a.action_type_other_org_civil_criminal , a.action_type_other_org_rights , a.action_type_other_org_etc , a.action_type_other_org_etc_txt , a.action_type_servie_rel , a.action_type_servie_rel_consulting , a.action_type_servie_rel_law_min , a.action_type_servie_rel_medic , a.action_type_servie_rel_etc , a.action_type_servie_rel_etc_txt , a.action_type_etc, a.action_type_etc_txt
, a.action_contents , a.action_type_cont , a.action_type_cont_etc_txt , a.after_plan , a.action_etc , a.consulting_history_no , a.action_consulting_date_from , a.action_consulting_date_to , a.counselNum , a.action_contents_etc
, a.delete_reason , a.create_user , a.create_date , a.update_user , a.update_date , a.delete_user , a.delete_date , a.delete_yn
, CASE WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'national' THEN '국가기관' WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'local' THEN '지방자치단체(지자체)' WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'public' THEN '공공기관' WHEN D.org_type_gov_detail = 'school' THEN '각급학교' ELSE '' END AS org_type_gov_detail_txt , CASE WHEN D.step_status = '1' THEN '신청' WHEN D.step_status = '2' THEN '접수대기' WHEN D.step_status = '3' THEN '접수승인' WHEN D.step_status = '4' THEN '접수불가' WHEN D.step_status = '5' THEN '심사대기' WHEN D.step_status = '6' THEN '심사거절' WHEN D.step_status = '7' THEN '심사승인' WHEN D.step_status = '8' THEN '진단 완료' ELSE '' END AS step_status_txt
FROM W_CONSULTING_ACTION_MASTER a JOIN zuser b on a.manager = b.userid LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT consulting_action_no, COUNT(*) AS ccnt FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr GROUP BY consulting_action_no ) C on a.consulting_action_no = C.consulting_action_no JOIN W_CONSULTING_APPLICATION_MASTER D ON a.consulting_action_no = D.consulting_application_no, (SELECT @rownum := #m#) R WHERE a.DELETE_YN = 'Q'
DATE_FORMAT($cond1$,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #sdate# AND #edate#
UPPER($cond2$) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#keyword#),'%')
ORDER BY a.registration_date DESC LIMIT #m#, #n# ) row_ WHERE @rownum < (#n#+#m#) ) c
SELECT C.USERID AS manager_id , C.USERNAME AS manager_name FROM ZAUTH_GROUP_MEMBER A JOIN ZAUTH_EMP B ON A.GROUPNO = 2 AND A.AUTH_NO = B.EMP_NO JOIN ZUSER C ON C.USERID = B.EMP_ID
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO w_consulting_action_rel_managesr ( consulting_action_no , manager , con_ac_type , create_user , create_date ) VALUES
( #consulting_action_no# , #managerList[]# , #con_ac_type# , #create_user# , NOW() )
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.manager as manager_id , b.USERNAME as manager_name FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr a join zuser b on a.manager = b.USERID WHERE consulting_action_no = #consulting_action_no#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO w_consulting_action_rel_commissioner ( consulting_action_no , counselNum , ac_com_date_from , ac_com_date_to , create_user , create_date ) VALUES
( #consulting_action_no# , #cmmList[].counselNum# , CASE WHEN #cmmList[].ac_com_date_from# = '' THEN NULL ELSE #cmmList[].ac_com_date_from# END , CASE WHEN #cmmList[].ac_com_date_to# = '' THEN NULL ELSE #cmmList[].ac_com_date_to# END , #create_user# , NOW() )
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.counselNum , b.counselName , a.ac_com_date_from , a.ac_com_date_to FROM w_consulting_action_rel_commissioner a join w_counselor b on a.counselNum = b.counselNum WHERE a.consulting_action_no = #consulting_action_no# AND a.delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY create_date DESC
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO w_consulting_action_rel_con ( action_no , consulting_no , create_user , create_date ) VALUES
( #consulting_action_no# , #consultingNoList[]# , #create_user# , NOW() )
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.NO , a.action_no , a.consulting_no , b.consulting_history_no , a.create_user , a.create_date , a.update_user , a.update_date , a.delete_user , a.delete_date , a.delete_yn FROM w_consulting_action_rel_con a JOIN w_consulting_history_master b ON a.consulting_no = b.NO WHERE a.action_no = #consulting_action_no# AND a.delete_yn = 'N'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE w_consulting_application_master SET step_status = #step_status# , update_user = #update_user# , update_date = NOW() WHERE consulting_application_no = #consulting_application_no#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CASE WHEN a.step_status = #step_status# THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS result FROM w_consulting_application_master a WHERE a.consulting_application_no = #consulting_application_no#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO w_application_step_history ( consulting_application_no , step_status , create_user , create_date ) VALUES ( #consulting_application_no# , #step_status# , #create_user# , NOW() )

sql.isNotEmpty: AND a.consulting_action_no IN ( SELECT consulting_action_no FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr WHERE manager = ( SELECT USERID FROM ZUSER WHERE USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#manager_name#,'%') ) AND con_ac_type = 'ac' )

sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select row_.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum_ from ( select count(*) over () as totalCount , a.consulting_action_no , DATE_FORMAT(a.registration_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as registration_date , ( CASE WHEN ccnt > 1 THEN concat(d.username,'외 ',ccnt-1,'인 ') ELSE d.username END ) AS manager_name , b.org_name , DATE_FORMAT(a.action_consulting_date_from, '%Y-%m-%d') as action_consulting_date_from , DATE_FORMAT(a.action_consulting_date_to, '%Y-%m-%d') as action_consulting_date_to , b.step_status , e.CODE_NM as step_status_name from w_consulting_action_master a join w_consulting_application_master b on a.consulting_action_no = b.consulting_application_no LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT consulting_action_no, COUNT(*) AS ccnt FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr GROUP BY consulting_action_no ) c ON a.consulting_action_no = c.consulting_action_no
JOIN zuser d on a.manager = d.userid join comtccmmndetailcode e on b.step_status = e.CODE and e.CODE_ID = 'STEP' ,(SELECT @rownum := #m#) R where 1 = 1
order by a.action_consulting_date_from desc LIMIT #m#, #n# ) row_ WHERE @rownum < (#n#+#m#) ) c

select count(*) from w_consulting_action_master a join w_consulting_application_master b on a.consulting_action_no = b.consulting_application_no LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT consulting_action_no, COUNT(*) AS ccnt FROM w_consulting_action_rel_managesr GROUP BY consulting_action_no ) c ON a.consulting_action_no = c.consulting_action_no
JOIN zuser d on a.manager = d.userid join comtccmmndetailcode e on b.step_status = e.CODE and e.CODE_ID = 'STEP' , ( select @rownum := 0) R where 1 = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM w_consulting_action_master WHERE consulting_action_no = #data#;
